title: Topic 002 Question 032
body: You are designing a storage solution that will ingest, store, and analyze petabytes (PBs) of structured, semi-structured, and unstructured text data. The analyzed data will be offloaded to Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 for long-term retention.
You need to recommend a storage and analytics solution that meets the following requirements:
•	Supports manual scaling, built-in autoscaling, and custom autoscaling
What should you include in the recommendation? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
